text:
Click to email this to a friend (Opens in new window)

The Kardashian men are finally fighting back! Sources tell Straight Shuter, Kanye West, Scott Disick, and Lamar Odom are fed up with never being able to speak on the family reality TV show Keeping Up With The Kardashians and as a result, they’re planning their own spinoff show, without the ladies!

Watch the video above and don’t forget to subscribe to our YouTube Channel!
title: Kardashian Men Planning Reality Show Spinoff
